About Alex Atanassov

Who in the world is that guy?

Hello. My name is Alex Atanassov and I'm currently a student learning JavaScript and Front-end Web Development in AP Comp Sci. I don't have much coding exprience, I learned a bit of C++ while coding an Arduino in STEM class last year, and I also know a tiny bit of Python which I learned using W3 Schools. I'm a pro at PCPartPicker and generally know a lot about computer specs. I generally enjoy learning about the world and watch a lot of educational youtube channels.

Some of my hobbies include:

  • Computers
  • Finance/Investing
  • Gaming

My favorite 3 open source projects are:

  1. Anki
  2. Only Office
  3. BeamMP
